cont.entity_a: The power button on one monitor does not work and is misaligned. The display corner flickers and the power button is intermittent. The power button is a common issue in the 2407WFP model.
cont.entity_b: The monitor lasted only 1 month before power board issues occurred.

cont.entity_a: Neither monitor came with the correct stand, affecting stability and adjustability.
One monitor had the bezel falling off.
The seller's claim of 'very good condition' was inaccurate.
cont.entity_b: Refurbished monitor has minor cosmetic blemishes.

cont.entity_a: Received a different model (WFP-HC) than ordered.
The monitor is sturdy with portrait and landscape viewing options.
cont.entity_b: Large speaker boxes make the monitor appear clunky. The base design prevents close keyboard placement.

cont.entity_a: Includes built-in USB and SD reader.
Offers great refresh rate and picture quality.
Older models are durable and provide clear, sharp images even after years of use.
Screen colors are washed out. Good for video and graphics with clear and fast display.
cont.entity_b: Can get stuck in a wrong aspect ratio mode. Picture quality is okay but not exceptional.

cont.entity_a: Dell's customer service was unhelpful in resolving delivery issues.
cont.entity_b: Delivery was two weeks late without explanation.
Crystal clear colors and low luminescence for night use.
Great price for size and performance.
